body_html:
Do you have a design doc?

In order to merge a feature like this, it would ideally be configured using Bazel, possible using cc_toolchain(). Our Makefile build system is community supported and intended for platforms that aren't able to run Bazel.

Do you have a design doc?
In order to merge a feature like this, it would ideally be configured using Bazel, possible using cc_toolchain(). Our Makefile build system is community supported and intended for platforms that aren't able to run Bazel.
body:
Do you have a design doc?

In order to merge a feature like this, it would ideally be configured using Bazel, possible using [cc_toolchain()](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/blob/master/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/rules/cpp/CcToolchain.java). Our Makefile build system is community supported and intended for platforms that aren't able to run Bazel.
